Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

phpbbtheme.com (74.52.144.122)

From: "Vjacheslav Trushkin" <cyberalien@gmail.com> 
To: info@inversorafoley.com, abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: abuse report: warez on phpbbtheme.com (74.52.144.122) 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
Content-Disposition: inline 
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com
designates 64.233.182.189 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.189;
envelope-from=cyberalien@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com; 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Feb 2007 21:17:11.0149 (UTC)
FILETIME=[A80021D0:01C75146] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
 
This is abuse report for website phpbbtheme.com 
hosted at IP 74.52.144.122 in your datacenter. 
 
They are offering for download designs for phpBB forum 
software stolen from other designers, including me, and 
replaced copyrights in those designs as if they have 
designed it. Its a clear copyright violation and should 
be considered as warez. 
 
URL: 
Their website: http://www.phpbbtheme.com/ 
 
Where they stole it from: 
Conundrum, Chairs: designed by mikelothar.com 
Morpheus, Aeolus, AcidTech: designed by me: phpbbstyles.com 
Charcoal, AirHead: designed by Zarron Media: zarron.com 
etc..  everything is stolen. 
 
Proofs: 
1. You can confirm authors for few styles at urls I provided 
above. 
2. Some of designs are offered on phpbb.com with original 
designer's copyrights. You can find them here: 
http://www.phpbb.com/phpBB/catdb.php?db=2 
3: Almost all of those designs are offered on phpbbhacks.com: 
http://www.phpbbhacks.com/templates.php 
You can see designs with exactly the same names on that 
website and by clicking on demo links you'll see correct copyright 
of original author, which has nothing to do with abuser's website. 
 
More detailed proof: 
You can confirm that designs are indeed stolen by downloading 
them from abuser's website, unpacking and looking in file 
"overall_footer.tpl" (its a text file). You will see that they have 
replaced designer's copyright with their own. 
 
 
Who am I, and why you should belive me instead of abuser: 
I'm former phpBB team member, which you can confirm on 
http://www.phpbb.com/about/ (I'm listed in "Past Contributors" 
section) 
 
I have also informed other designers who's designs are stolen 
by abuser, so you can expect emails from them too, and in case if 
my proof is not convincing enough I'm sure they'll provide 
different proof. 
 
Sincerely, 
Vjacheslav Trushkin.
